225.movie_name: And Now for Something Completely Different (1971)

248.movie_plot: Eight teenagers are trapped after hours in a high-tech shopping mall and pursued by three murderous security robots out of control.

231.movie_plot: The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

222.movie_plot: A stray cat is the linking element of three tales of suspense and horror.

200.movie_name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988)

244.movie_plot: The ancient Indian cemetery with the power to raise the dead returns and influences the lives of new residents.

215.movie_plot: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

194.movie_plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

230.movie_plot: Mike, now released from a psychiatric hospital, continues his journey to stop the evil Tall Man from his grim work.

240.movie_plot: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

237.movie_plot: When the brilliant, but unorthodox scientist, Dr. Victor Frankenstein, rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes, and later swears revenge.

235.movie_plot: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

209.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning (1985)
209.movie_plot: The making of Friday the 13th: A New Beginning (1985) with interviews with the cast and crew.

165.movie_plot: Two years after the first series of murders, a new psychopath dons the Ghostface costume and a new string of killings begins.

79.movie_plot: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

2.movie_plot: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

125.movie_plot: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

22.movie_plot: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.

34.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

73.movie_plot: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.

44.movie_plot: Two counterculture bikers travel from Los Angeles to New Orleans in search of America.

55.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

9.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

130.movie_plot: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

37.movie_plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

7.movie_plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

16.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

174.movie_plot: The puppets return and hunt paranormal researchers in an attempt to take their brain fluid for their master, Andre Toulon.

14.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

129.movie_plot: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

99.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

115.movie_plot: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

36.movie_plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

178.movie_plot: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

191.movie_plot: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is turned on by a beautiful drifter.

Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled on a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

126.movie_plot: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

49.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

153.movie_plot: Remake of the 1958 sci-fi horror classic about a deadly blob from another planet which consumes everything in its path. Teenagers attempt without success to warn the townspeople, who refuse to take them seriously.

66.movie_plot: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.
